mapper.sql: g.ID, g.CODE, g.NAME, g.SHORT_NAME, g.PRICE, g.PURCHASE_PRICE, g.CLASS_ID, g.SUPPLIER_ID, g.AGENT_PRICE, g.ACTIVITY_PRICE, g.STOCK_NUM, g.DELETE_FLAG, g.CREATE_DATE, g.CREATOR_ID, g.MODIFY_DATE, g.MODIFIER_ID, s.NAME SUPPLIER_NAME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from scdd_goods g left join scdd_supplier s on g.supplier_id = s.id
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into scdd_goods (ID, CODE, NAME, SHORT_NAME, PRICE, PURCHASE_PRICE, CLASS_ID, SUPPLIER_ID, AGENT_PRICE, ACTIVITY_PRICE, STOCK_NUM, DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATOR_ID, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFIER_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agentPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{activityPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stockNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifierId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update scdd_goods
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CODE = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHORT_NAME = #{record.shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{record.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PURCHASE_PRICE = #{record.purchasePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLASS_ID = #{record.classId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SUPPLIER_ID = #{record.supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AGENT_PRICE = #{record.agentPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACTIVITY_PRICE = #{record.activityPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STOCK_NUM = #{record.stockNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DELETE_FLAG = #{record.deleteFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MODIFY_DATE = #{record.modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update scdd_goods set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CODE = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHORT_NAME = #{record.shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{record.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PURCHASE_PRICE = #{record.purchasePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLASS_ID = #{record.classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SUPPLIER_ID = #{record.supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AGENT_PRICE = #{record.agentPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACTIVITY_PRICE = #{record.activityPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STOCK_NUM = #{record.stockNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DELETE_FLAG = #{record.deleteFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MODIFY_DATE = #{record.modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update scdd_goods
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHORT_NAME = #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PURCHASE_PRICE = #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLASS_ID = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AGENT_PRICE = #{agentPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACTIVITY_PRICE = #{activityPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STOCK_NUM = #{stockNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
